GOD.content: acc. Patočka, individualism in technological civilization relies on misunderstanding of unique self, individualism is a role not a person; thus individualism becomes socialism, liberalism joins socialism, democracy totalitarianism; equality for all is equality of roles not persons [Derrida deconstructs this critique: it hearkens back to an originary authenticity]

R.content: roué qualifies one who turns a trick, the voyou (rogue) w/ his leading astray (dévoiement), debauchery, worklessness, always a seduction, licentious, libertine [always men, sexual difference]
democracy always associated w/ this figure, w/ taking too many liberties, libertine, liberalism, “everything is allowed,” announces a beheading of monarchical sovereignty

freedom and equality are reconcilable, so to speak, only in a turning or alternating fashion, only in alternation, must assure a turning to come and a returning to origin: govern and governed, in turn

FL.content: politicization is interminable but not total, each advance in politics demands we rethink their calculation; this holds true for classical emancipatory ideal which cannot be maintained today w/out producing the worst complicities
when left and right look the same (founding violence)
acc. Benjamin, antimilitary pacifists fail to recognize law-preserving violence
via Benjamin, the threat of the law (to itself and outwards) is neither intimidation nor dissuasion (as pacifists, anarchists or activists believe): it is threatening like fate is threatening

SPOM.content: evangelism, good news of alliance of liberal democracy and “free market”

BSi.content: Derrida on how zoos hide limits, interiorize, hollowed-out (en creux) limits [ditch instead of bars] > repressive violence w/ liberal, idealist, spiritualist grimace

FWT.content: the nationalism of republican “universalism” protesting against “democratic” communitarianism almost always voiced by strongest community [Black Lives Matter]
double-edged sword of “political correctness,” two-sided trap > thus, high-risk debate

general ethics of vigilance re: signals of phallocentrism/racism seems necessary > its caricature [i.e. caricature of the vigilance] is in the minority, in those cases conservatives have a right to complain [is it still in the minority?]
specular countersignature, re: communitarianism of oppressed, reactive self-defense, too symmetrical of a response [Derrida couldn’t tolerate being “integrated” into Jewish school]

DPi.content: Derrida disagrees w/ Baudelaire’s take on abolitionists, but feels his suspicion is indefinitely necessary re: hypocrisy & symptomal ruses that agitates/animates defenders of just causes

EU.content: Kant’s (not unconditional) liberalism would caution against crossing certain limits, so as to avoid total absolutization of State
for Schelling, State is philosophy/action > standpoint of Ur-wissen
Kant at once safeguards (garantissant) most totalitarian of social forms & gives place to intransigently liberal resistance
